title: File Manager for Android Wear
summary: Send,Receive files between Watch and Phone, view photo on the watch.

No. 51, YuanMingYuan Xi Road, Haidian Dist
Beijing, China
description: The first File Manager for you Android Wear Watch, you can use it to find files on your watch, send or receive files from your phone to your Watch, and view photo or text file on the watch. This App also have the full feature Phone File Manager included. Features (some features only available on the phone):- list all files and folders- touch the file/folder icon to open file/folder- order by name/date/file size- send via email/bluetooth/note (Phone Only)- rename file- batch delete file- open file based on type- built-in Photo Viewer- action button: Refresh,Send to Phone Or Watch, SDCard,select all, share, rename, delete, order by name, order by date, order by file size- Photo Slides view, touch left top corner to play slides, touch right top corner go to previous photo, touch right bottom corner go to next photo- Change Photo Slides timer in option menu (Phone Only)- Built-in text file viewerFAQ:* Where can I find the files sent ?The receiving folder is the folder you open when you send files to Watch or Phone. You can use the SDCard icon to go to SDCard folder to receiving files.* What's the ICON means ?The icon from left to right means: Refresh, Send file, go to SD Card folder, Select All, Share files, Rename file, Delete File, Order by Name, Order by length, New Folder, copy file, cut , paste, cancel.We have just released the 'Watch Tools for Android Wear' with App Launcher and remote control phone features, you can find it here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.woiapp.WearWatchTools(Special Notes for Install: Android Wear Watch App install takes extra time, so please wait about 20s ~ 1minute after phone install App complete.)
descriptionHTML:
The first File Manager for you Android Wear Watch, you can use it to find files on your watch, send or receive files from your phone to your Watch, and view photo or text file on the watch. This App also have the full feature Phone File Manager included.

Features (some features only available on the phone):
- list all files and folders
- touch the file/folder icon to open file/folder
- order by name/date/file size
- send via email/bluetooth/note (Phone Only)
- rename file
- batch delete file
- open file based on type
- built-in Photo Viewer
- action button: Refresh,Send to Phone Or Watch, SDCard,select all, share, rename, delete, order by name, order by date, order by file size
- Photo Slides view, touch left top corner to play slides, touch right top corner go to previous photo, touch right bottom corner go to next photo
- Change Photo Slides timer in option menu (Phone Only)
- Built-in text file viewer

FAQ:
* Where can I find the files sent ?
The receiving folder is the folder you open when you send files to Watch or Phone. You can use the SDCard icon to go to SDCard folder to receiving files.

* What's the ICON means ?
The icon from left to right means: Refresh, Send file, go to SD Card folder, Select All, Share files, Rename file, Delete File, Order by Name, Order by length, New Folder, copy file, cut , paste, cancel.


We have just released the 'Watch Tools for Android Wear' with App Launcher and remote control phone features, you can find it here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.woiapp.WearWatchTools

(Special Notes for Install: Android Wear Watch App install takes extra time, so please wait about 20s ~ 1minute after phone install App complete.)
comments: Still needs tweaking You still can't see bottom icons on moto 360, even if the developer said it's fixed. In text viewer words should be wrapped to a rectangular area in order to be able to read them. Also font size would be very useful. No zooming on pictures. At this stage I wouldn't recommend buying it. Waiting for an update to review my rating.

Decent but needs fix. Unable to view menu across bottom of watch display. Seen this brought up for months and would think dev would fix for the watch that has the highest number of users that would use such an app. Other than that it is pretty decent with decent permissions for an unrooted device.
Pretty useless on the Moto 360.  The Moto 360 "flat tire" hides over half of the menu and makes it nearly impossible to view and select actions from the menu.

Rip off. I paid for the app, it doesn't install on my S5 and Moto360. Tried to uninstall to get a refund within 15 minutes but since it won't install, I can't uninstall. Stay away from this piece of junk. Thank John Li for stealing my money.
Sony Smartwatch 3 Would give it a 4+ if there were some way of natively managing file extentions.
Lg urbane watch The top is not visibly on the lg urbane watch
recentChanges: - Update toolbar for Round Watch (LG R or Moto 360)
